Cream Cheese Frosting

A rich and creamy frosting perfect for cakes, cupcakes, or cookies.

Yield: About 2 cups

frosting

Ingredients

Frosting Ingredients

  • 8 oz cream cheese, softened
  • 1/2 cup butter, softened
  • 2 tsp vanilla extract
  • 2-3 cups powdered sugar

Procedure

Make the Frosting

  1. Cream together the butter, cream cheese, and vanilla until smooth.
  2. Add powdered sugar half a cup at a time, mixing completely after each addition.
  3. Stop adding powdered sugar once the frosting reaches the desired sweetness and consistency.
